00031 {

00034 void TCPMsgBasedRcvQueue::init(uint32 startSeq)
00035 {

00038 
00039 std::string TCPMsgBasedRcvQueue::info() const
00040 {
00041     std::string res;
00042     char buf[32];
00043     sprintf(buf, "rcv_nxt=%u ", rcv_nxt);
00044     res = buf;
00045 
00046     for (RegionList::const_iterator i=regionList.begin(); i!=regionList.end(); ++i)
00047     {
00048         sprintf(buf, "[%u..%u) ", i->begin, i->end);
00049         res+=buf;
00050     }
00051     sprintf(buf, "%u msgs", payloadList.size());
00052     res+=buf;
00053 
00054     return res;
00055 }
00056 
00057 uint32 TCPMsgBasedRcvQueue::insertBytesFromSegment(TCPSegment *tcpseg)
00058 {
00059     TCPVirtualDataRcvQueue::insertBytesFromSegment(tcpseg);
00060 
00061     cPacket *msg;
00062     uint32 endSeqNo;
00063     while ((msg=tcpseg->removeFirstPayloadMessage(endSeqNo))!=NULL)
00064     {
00065         // insert, avoiding duplicates
00066         PayloadList::iterator i = payloadList.find(endSeqNo);
00067         if (i!=payloadList.end()) {delete msg; continue;}
00068         payloadList[endSeqNo] = msg;
00069     }
00070 
00071     return rcv_nxt;
00072 }
00073 
00074 cPacket *TCPMsgBasedRcvQueue::extractBytesUpTo(uint32 seq)
00075 {
00076     extractTo(seq);
00077 
00078     // pass up payload messages, in sequence number order
00079     if (payloadList.empty() || seqGreater(payloadList.begin()->first, seq))
00080         return NULL;
00081 
00082     cPacket *msg = payloadList.begin()->second;
00083     payloadList.erase(payloadList.begin());
00084     return msg;
00085 }
